text.page:
508
102-254b @#/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstod pa/ /dus

509
102-255a gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po dang / /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum gyi rgyus/ /sdig smin las grub lha dang lha ma yin/ /dmyal tshogs me ltar 'bar ba'i gnas 'di ru/ /sha khrag dmar la rol ba'i lha mo khyod/ /lha yi g.yul ngo rgyal bar zhal 'ches la/ /lha ma yin gyi dpung rnams brlag par mdzod/ /ces bstod do/ /rdzogs s+ho//
